description: Numbers n such that phi(n) + 1 is prime.
comments: Positive integers n for which values of A039649(n) are primes. - _Vladimir Shevelev_, May 10 2008For every prime p, the numbers p and 2p are terms of this sequence. - _Vladimir Shevelev_, May 10 2008Union of A000040 and A066071. - _Ray Chandler_, May 26 2008
